Sentencas: Freeze casting yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) can be useful in making electrodes for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) by introducing hierarchical porosity to increase triple-phase boundary (TPB) area while maintaining adequate fuel flow.
Titulo: Freeze-cast yttria-stabilized zirconia pore networks: Effects of alcohol additives

Sentencas: In this study the influence of alcohol additives on pore structure of aqueous YSZ freeze-cast samples was investigated.
Titulo: Freeze-cast yttria-stabilized zirconia pore networks: Effects of alcohol additives

Sentencas: Slurries with ethanol, iso-propyl alcohol, or methanol as additives were compared to a control sample.
Titulo: Freeze-cast yttria-stabilized zirconia pore networks: Effects of alcohol additives

Sentencas: Pore characteristics along sample lengths were measured using X-ray computed tomography reconstructions.
Titulo: Freeze-cast yttria-stabilized zirconia pore networks: Effects of alcohol additives

Sentencas: The control sample showed significant changes in pore size along sample length, whereas pore size of the alcohol additive samples remained similar, indicating that freezing rates of the additive samples remained constant during solidification.
Titulo: Freeze-cast yttria-stabilized zirconia pore networks: Effects of alcohol additives

Sentencas: Ice lens formation and interactions between alcohols and slurry functional additives (dispersant, surfactant, and binder) resulted in complex pore structures which show promise in increasing SOFC TPB area.
Titulo: Freeze-cast yttria-stabilized zirconia pore networks: Effects of alcohol additives
